answers.answer: Congratulations and bless you and your family. I hope that she will be home with you soon. I am due on August 11th and can't wait to finally met my girl. Wishing you all the best. X

I thank you so much for your comment,and I pray that God bless your family and yourself as well and may you have a safe and smooth labour and delivery and a quick recovery time so that you can be up and about enjoying your new family member,I've been trying to make myself delete this app since I delivered my baby but I'm so used to it being on my phone lol.be safe and God bless.

Congrats for you and the healthy baby girl!Btw I took months deleting the app after I had my first baby, I will say though I've seen other moms post questions about newborns and help advice too. :) best of luck to you & your family!

Thanks for commenting,yeah I think it may take me a while to delete this app lol but it's ok.Sounds as though you are expecting again,good luck and blessings to you and your family as well take care and take it easy.God bless.

question: It has been a long and tough journey for me but God has and still is helping through it.I had my daughter at 36 weeks on July 21,2015.I did not find out until birth that she was a girl because she would never show anything she's been very modest,my husband says that she will be just find if she continues how she's started,meaning not showing anything ha ha so funny but oh so true.She's still at the hospital since she was early and I am so ready to have my little spicy princess with us but it will happen in due time.One thing I do want to mention is preeclampsia the high blood pressure problem that happens in pregnancy.After months of me reading about it it happened suddenly to me on the day before I gave birth,I was on an appointment and they checked my pressure and saw that my baby was less active and under weight for 36 weeks she was being affected by it so now Im taking high blood pressure medication and was told that it could last up to six weeks after birth sooooooo ladies if any swelling,pain,decreased fetal movement (do not wait)to go and check on your baby.She's doing wonderful now and through it all I give my God thanks for a smooth and quick labour and delivery experience.May the lord also be there for you all as he has and is there for my family and I.Well I guess that's all,for months I've enjoyed this app and it's been fun.last time signing over and out Cutelittlefinger.God bless .
title: Finally my daughter has arrived my mood=Grateful :-).
